chargeHist.descr: Deliver Suboxone within 1000 feet of park as repeater

result.execSummary:
The defendant April M. HUCHTHAUSEN was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Deliver Suboxone, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

Maintain fulltime employment, schooling or a combination of both.

Obtain high school diploma, GED or HSED.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Provide DNA sample.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

timeConds.notes: Under the Huber Law, commencing immediately.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. April M. HUCHTHAUSEN

Defendant in custody on bench warrant. The matter is continued for an initial appearance on 09-14-15 at 2:30 p.m.  The $2,000.00 recognizance bond previously furnished is modified to $500.00 cash with all conditions remaining.  Cash bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
Bench warrant with service of officer thereon.
Minutes.
Warrant served.

Defendant failed to appear for initial appearance.   Bench warrant authorized.   Court converts defendant's bail to $500.00 cash. 
Minutes.

Conditions:
Defendant must report to the MTDP for fingerprints, photographs and identifying information within 24 hours.
Defendant must maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs except for medications prescribed to her.

Defendant in custody on warrant and by Attorney Ann Larson.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of deliver suboxone within 1000 feet of park-repeater.  The matter is continued for initial appearance to 08-31-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $2,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions defendant must report to the MTPD for fingerprints, photographs and identifying information within 24 hours of release and defendant must maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs except for medications prescribed to her.  Bail furnished and defendant is remanded to the County Jail serving city commitments.
Warrant returned with service of officer thereon.
RE:  Deliver Suboxone within 1000 feet of park as repeater, on 05-11-15.
